def function(n, a, b):
	c = []
	for i in range(n):
		c.append((a[i] + b[i]) % n)
	c.sort()
	return c

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
b = list(map(int, input().split()))
c = function(n, a, b)
print(*c)

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
b = list(map(int, input().split()))

a.sort()
b.sort()

for i in range(n):
    print((a[i]+b[i])%n, end=' ')

from collections import defaultdict
n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))
b = list(map(int, input().split()))

a_dict = defaultdict(list)
for i, x in enumerate(a):
    a_dict[x].append(i)

b_dict = defaultdict(list)
for i, x in enumerate(b):
    b_dict[x].append(i)

c = [0] * n
for i in range(n):
    for j in a_dict[i]:
        for k in b_dict[n - i]:
            c[j] = k
            b_dict[n - i].remove(k)
            break
print(*c)
